overview:
Steven C. Wyer was born in Illinois, lived all over the Midwest as a kid and has called Nashville, Tennessee home for the past twenty-five years.

His background covers a wide range of interests from television production to co-founding a global nutritional company, then starting companies in several regulated industries including insurance, real estate, and securities.

One of his ventures, Wyer Creative Communications, was as recognized in 1999 as the fastest growing company in middle Tennessee for five consecutive years and appointed to the Nashville Chamber of Commerce Hall Of Fame for private business.

He currently spends his time overseeing Reputation Advocate, a company that specializes in online reputation management and repair.

When not at the office, you can find Steve Wyer reading a good book, walking at Radnor Lake State Park, journaling or spending time around a fire with good friends.

Steven C. Wyer is the Managing Director of Reputation Advocate Reputation Advocate serves private and public business, professionals, medical and legal professionals athletes, individuals and families in the research and defense of on-line reputation.

The explosive growth of search engine use, social sites, online forums and online relationships has created tens of thousands of companies and individuals that are being slandered, humiliated and abused. By posting a few negative comments, a bad review, a customer complaint or even a picture, reputations are destroyed.

Utilizing web developers, search engine experts, programmers, data and information sources, Reputation Advocates aggressively alters search, blog, forum and public web page results for its clients. Results are immediate, long lasting and guaranteed. Our clientele is global and includes politicians, athletes, students applying for scholarships, professionals in all lines of work and both head hunters and those seeking employment.
